H0.text: What type of plant is a nardoo. Fern

H1.text: What type of plant is a nardoo. Bamboo

H2.text: What type of plant is a nardoo. Sago Palm

H3.text: What type of plant is a nardoo. Fren

A4.text: Marsilea drummondii is a species of fern known by the common name nardoo.

A5.text: It is a rhizomatous perennial aquatic fern that roots in mud substrates and produces herbage that floats on the surface of quiet water bodies.
